title: League of legends start up icon freeze HELP
body:
SO the "PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working" error popped up after i wanted to play league.
I fixed it but now, the startup icon when you click league is frozen.
I had to re-install so i can fix the pvp.net error and when the league of legends icon pops up, there is a bar below it showing its progress in starting league so i can patch. The bar wont go up. I have waited a near 30 minutes and it wont go up.
PLS HELP

replies.body:
Hey ih8yuu,

Can you try the solutions provided in the following thread and let me know whether anything works for you?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues
